Node.definition: marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

= causative action by which someone causes someone else to take off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which brings shame on that person and to those who stand in a close relation to them
= part where converging sides or edges of an object meet; ≈ sometimes associated with the far side of an object
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= process by which something has been deformed or destroyed by heavy pressure
= causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= inhabitant of Ammon (עַמֹּון)
= inhabitant of Moab (מֹואָב)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

= action by which humans meet other humans that are travelling from one location to another ► either with good or with evil intentions; ≈ often extended to describe certain events that happen in people's lives

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes
= causative action by which humans obtain the service of other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Beor (בְּעֹור) from Pethor (פְּתֹור) ► a non Israelite prophet or fortune teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Balaam (בִּלְעָם)
= town; ◄ north of Mesopotamia; ► home of Balaam (בִּלְעָם)

= region, also known as Paddan Aram (פַּדַּן אֲרָם) ◄ located in upper Mesopotamia (אֲרַם נַהֲרַיִם) around the great bend of the Euphrates (פְּרָת) River in northern Syria (אֲרָם) ► ancestral home of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) family, homeland of Balaam (בִּלְעָם) the son of Beor (בְּעֹור) and the country of Cushan Rishathaim (כּוּשַׁן רִשְׁעָתַיִם) the first of the kings who oppressed Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in the book of Judges

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= state in which someone is willing to do something
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= man; ◄ son of Beor (בְּעֹור) from Pethor (פְּתֹור) ► a non Israelite prophet or fortune teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path
= causative process by which humans or deities give events a different nature
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which humans make an effort to ensure that a certain event takes place
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= person originating from Edom (אֱדֹום)
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= descendant or inhabitant of Mizraim (מִצְרַיִם) (Egypt)

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly

Node.gloss: to be careful|to make sure|to take precautions
Node.definition: = action by which humans ensure their own well being by being watchful, by making sure that certain instructions are carried out, or by refraining from certain activities
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which people, animals, or objects are considered free from contamination, ► as a result of which the people can interact socially with others and the objects can be put to normal use
= process by which humans have an accidental emission of a body fluid such as urine or semen during the night ► and become unclean as a result
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= referent to the location outside of an object
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

Node.gloss: to take a bath|to bathe|to wash
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers
literally: hand; hence: = a space designated for a certain purpose
= referent to the location outside of an object
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= referent to the location outside of an object
= small, pointed tool; ► used for digging small holes in the ground
= set of tools and utensils that nomads usually carry with them
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= referent to the location outside of an object
= action by which humans break up and move earth, usually with a tool, and with the purpose of creating a hole
= action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before
= causative action by which humans or deities cover a surface with their hands, a piece of cloth, a substance, or an object, ► often with the purpose of making this surface invisible or inaccessible

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= excrement; ◄ produced by humans and animals; ► source of pollution and impurity; ≈ regarded as filthy
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move through an area without a specific destination
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers
literally: holy; hence: = state in which people have separated themselves from others ► in order to live their life in conformity to God's commandments

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: to turn away (from someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities stop associating with other humans or deities
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= causative action of controling and restricting movement; that is, to hand over a person or an object to another's control
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at
= causative action by which humans cause hardship to other humans
= woman employed to have sexual intercourse with other people as part of local fertility rites; ► forbidden under Mosaic law
literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man employed to have sexual intercourse with other people as part of local fertility rites; ► forbidden under Mosaic law
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= object given in possession to somebody else
= woman that sells her body for payment, making of this her profession; ≈ often associated with shame and sinful behavior
= the amount of money expected, required, or given in payment for something

= male person involved in sexual intercourse in or around a sanctuary, probably for religious reasons; ≈ practice was prohibited in Mosaic law and for that reason regarded as despicable, hence the epithet dog

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= state in which an event is considered utterly wrong and detestable
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= action in which a person requires someone to pay interest for having borrowed money, food, or something of value
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= the amount of money a person is required to pay for having borrowed money, food, or something of value
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= the amount of money a person is required to pay for having borrowed money, food, or something of value
= any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth
= the amount of money a person is required to pay for having borrowed money, food, or something of value
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action in which a person is required to pay interest to someone else for having borrowed money, food, or something of value
= person who comes from a foreign country and therefore has a different status from those who are native born
= action in which a person requires someone to pay interest for having borrowed money, food, or something of value
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= action in which a person requires someone to pay interest for having borrowed money, food, or something of value

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action by which humans take ownership of land and other possessions

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to delay|to linger|to stay|to be slow
Node.definition: = to do something later than expected
= causative action by which deities hold humans accountable for some event and demand satisfaction
= causative action by which deities hold humans accountable for some event and demand satisfaction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which a human being is responsible for a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether committed on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= causative action by which humans desist from performing an event that has not yet started

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= state in which a human being is responsible for a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether committed on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= process by which an event starts from a certain place or position
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= grain as it is growing on the field and awaiting harvesting; it burns easily; people can pluck the ears and eat the grains
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= causative action by which humans remove leaves, branches, fruits, or the entire stalk of a plant

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= large, curved knife with a short wooden handle (15 20 centimeters); ► used for cutting grain
= grain as it is growing on the field and awaiting harvesting; it burns easily; people can pluck the ears and eat the grains
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
